snippet: Noah Gotbaum’s stepmother, Betsy Gotbaum, a former public advocate, is backing State Senator Daniel L. Squadron, who she said had laid out an impressive vision for the job.
abstract: Noah E Gotbaum's stepmother Betsy Gotbaum is backing State Senator Daniel L Squadron, not her stepson, in Democratic primary for New York City public advocate; assures that her decision is not personal.
lead_paragraph: Noah Gotbaum’s stepmother, Betsy Gotbaum, a former public advocate, is backing State Senator Daniel L. Squadron, who she said had laid out an impressive vision for the job.

headline.seo: Betsy Gotbaum, Ex-Public Advocate, Backs Stepson’s Opponent in Race
headline.main: Candidate’s Stepmother Declines to Endorse Him for Public Advocate
headline.print_headline: Stepmother Of Candidate Is Declining To Back Him
